job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement scalable and reliable backend systems and infrastructure to support our products
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of building and maintaining software systems, which falls under traditional software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain our micro-services to expose platform functionality to internal and external clients
job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining micro-services is a classic software development task focused on exposing functionality, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with development and quality assurance teams to ensure high availability, scalability, and security of our systems
job_tasks.justification: This describes collaboration on core software engineering concerns like availability, scalability, and security, which are part of building robust systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with DevOps Engineers to ensure the continuous delivery and deployment of software products
job_tasks.justification: This task involves working with DevOps practices for continuous delivery and deployment, which aligns with the operational aspects of software engineering, including MLOps/LLMOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with software developers to identify and implement improvements to our platform architecture and functionality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to improving existing software architecture and functionality, a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain documentation of our systems and processes
job_tasks.justification: Documentation is a standard part of the software development lifecycle, supporting the maintenance and understanding of systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Mentor and train junior members of the backend team
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring and training are clear indicators of collaboration and knowledge sharing within a team.

job_tasks.phrase: Keep up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly points to the need for continuous learning and staying current with technological advancements.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with development and quality assurance teams
soft_skills.justification: Directly mentions collaboration with other teams.
Directly mentions collaboration with DevOps Engineers.
Indicates working with other software developers.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional software engineering tasks such as designing, implementing, and maintaining backend systems, micro-services, and infrastructure. There is no mention of AI/ML models, Generative AI, prompt engineering, RAG, or any AI-specific model development or data tasks. The role involves collaboration with DevOps and other developers, but the core responsibilities are purely software engineering. Therefore, it fits the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its requirements, focusing entirely on backend software engineering without any mention of AI/ML. This makes the classification straightforward and unambiguous.
